# Membaca Data
```{r}
# Membaca data
civillabor <- read.table("C:/Users/LENOVO/OneDrive/Documents/UNY/Semester 2/civil_labor.txt", header = TRUE)

# Menampilkan struktur data
str(civillabor)

# Memeriksa data
head(civillabor)
```

# Eksplorasi Data
```{r}
summary(civillabor)

plot(civillabor$population, civillabor$civil_labor, xlab="Population", ylab="Civil Labor",pch=16)
```

# Persamaan Regresi
```{r}
modela<-lm(civil_labor~population,data=civillabor)
summary(modela)
```

# Asumsi 1: Rata-rata galat diasumsikan bernilai nol
```{r}
plot(civillabor$population, modela$Residuals, 
 xlab="Population (X)", ylab="Residuals", 
 main="Plot Uji Asumsi Rata-rata Galat bernilai nol")
```
